column3: Hopefully people won't start crying that their transaction disappeared and such when their branch is orphaned...\n
@laanwj IMHO we can't protect people from everything and should not special case too much (and that I learned from you ^^).\n

Yes, I was just playing devil's advocate. We don't have the 'immature' balance for nothing, it means that the mined transaction is not yet set in stone.

Why is this inverted? Won't it hide all non-coinbase txns? O.o\n
